mcsema.cfg_ida – IDA Pro get_cfg.py wrapper¶

class mcsema.cfg_ida.IDACFGGenerator(ida_exec, get_cfg_py, input_file)¶

Wrapper to conveniently run IDA Pro with get_cfg.py script. ida_exec specifies the path to idaq or idaq64 for 64Bit binaries. get_cfg_py specifies the path to get_cfg.py. input_file specifies the path to the binary.

func_maps¶

List of paths to txt files containing information about external functions.

entry_symbols¶

List of entry points.

debug_mode¶
batch_mode¶
execute(cfg_file)¶

Executes IDA Pro to recover CFG and save to cfg_file.
